name: Lunar Lander (itch) (treanor)
description:
This was a learning project based on a course from Gamedev.Tv.  The original course was in Unity, but I wanted to see if I could port it to Unreal, as that is the engine I've chosen to work in for the moment.

It's pretty simple, 10 levels, fly from the blue platform to the green.

Controls are A and D to rotate left/right and space to thrust.

This is my first finished game project so any feedback is welcome.  Enjoy!
